Margarita

tequila
cointreau

Ingredients

  • 3 oz tequila (blanco or repesado)
  • 2 oz lime juice
  • 1 oz orange liquer (citronge, triple sec, grand marnier)
  • 1/2 oz agave nectar (optional)

Procedure

  1. Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice
  2. Shake until chilled
  3. Strain into glass with fresh ice (optional salt ring)
  4. Optionally garnish with lime wedge
